(#{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.name}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.code}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.projectId}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.objectId}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.envId}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.operationType}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.rdupmType}, #{devopsDeployAppCenterEnvDTO.chartSource})

SELECT * FROM devops_deploy_app_center_env ddace LEFT JOIN devops_env de ON de.id = ddace.env_id LEFT JOIN devops_env_user_permission deup ON deup.env_id = de.id WHERE ddace.project_id = #{projectId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND (de.is_skip_check_permission = 1 OR deup.iam_user_id = #{userId}) AND ddace.env_id = #{envId, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ddace.rdupm_type = 'chart'
AND ddace.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND ddace.operation_type = #{operationType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND ddace.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{params, jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
ORDER BY ddace.id DESC
